message.body: Hey Wendy I'm actually not going to be prepared to discusses anything. Sorry. Everything ok with you? Should I come by tonight after class and sleep over, we can have early coffee bc I have class at 930 in the morning
I understand. Good idea re: sleep over! No pressure; call me tonite when u get out of class and see how u feel.
Ok. Cool. I get around nine is that ok?
Yeah call me then. Also I am gonna text Ariel to see if she wants to have dinner but I bet she is studying.
PS if u come tonite I will pay for a cab.
Try her. She might be free for dinner. I would like to come. I won't have pjs or anything though. It would be nice to see you.
I have extra nite gown
I'm in a crying state. Is that ok?
No prob. And we can undo it by being cozy and going to sleep early, and look forward to our morning coffee.
Still in class
You think I can still come?
Or is it too late?
I will understand
My dear I am so sleeeepy.... Can we have phone coffee in the morning? Anytime you say!!
Ok! No we don't need to talk its ok!!! Love you
I love you! Call if u want anytime, so sorry I am so wimpy!!!
PS please know that if you ever need to come you must be honest bc you are so important to me!!!!
Awww. U r going back to Brooklyn tomorrow
No, but I have to go out w a friend tomorrow nite, and then all day w mom Friday. But may be around Friday night, you? Shall check in....
Yes def here Friday night
Ok lemmee see how it goes w my mom, ok? Let's check on w each other Friday afternoon, is that ok ?
Ok Gnite darling
Yes yes
